reviewText: Great movie! Started a bit slow, but it was totally worth it to buy it even though I hadn't watched it before, because the story is great, and even more since it's based on a true story

Husband, mom, and dad all enjoyed this movie. All the music was good.
Packaging was good and came brand new sealed. All in all very pleased!

A totally blatant call for Indian nationalism verging on the ultra.  Based on highly dubious historical claims of Colonial India having flown the first manned airplane in the late 1890s. A fine performance by the great Mithun Chakraborty is not enough to save this film. Buy or stream "OMG-Oh My God" or better still watch Mani Ratnam's immortal "Guru" (with Abishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai - based on the life of Indian billionaire Dhirajlal Hirachand "Dhirubhai" Ambani) where Chakraborty gives the performance of his life as the editor of the newspaper who mentors Abishek/Gurukant/Ambani to greatness.
